DOC.brief_title: Steroid Aromatase Inhibitors Versus Progestogens nSAID-resistanced Late Stage Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized Study Steroid Aromatase Inhibitors Versus Progestogens Non-Steroid Aromatase Inhibitor-resistanced Late Stage Breast Cancer.The primary endpoint study progression free survival ( PFS ) . The secondary endpoint overall response rate ( ORR ) , overall survival ( OS ) safety .
